player module¶

class player.Player(name, points)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class of player

guess1()[source]¶

Add 1 point when you guess correctly

guess2(i=1)[source]¶

Add (points * i) points when you guess correctly word :param i - number of undiscovered letters

guess3(i=1)[source]¶

Subtract (points * and) points when you guess the word correctly :param i - number of undiscovered letters

play = False¶

Hangman
